hadiths.text: Narrated Buraydah ibn al-Hasib: The Prophet (ﷺ) said: Give good tidings to those who walk to the mosques in darkness for having a perfect light on the Day of Judgment

chapter.ara-name: باب مَا جَاءَ فِي الْمَشْىِ إِلَى الصَّلاَةِ فِي الظُّلَمِ
chapter.eng-name: What Has Been Narrated About (The Blessings Of) Walking To The Masjid In Darkness
